review.title: “Excellent!”
review.pros: Pros – Great family owned. Your Mom and Pap store. Great People/Honest people....Pleasure working for them. Great experience!
review.cons: Cons – there are no negatives working for this company. Have a good work ethic and be honest and the owners will be flexible with you
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Expand to other areas in the city!
